	石比例 [varchar](50) NULL,
	外比例 [varchar](50) NULL,
	水比例 [varchar](50) NULL,
	硅量 [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	超量 [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	硅掺 [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	超掺 [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	水泥替代率 [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	粉超 [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_a_临时_搅拌站5] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[任务编号] ASC,
	[搅拌站] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]



DECLARE @任务编号 VARCHAR(50)
DECLARE @搅拌站 VARCHAR(50)
DECLARE @备用15 VARCHAR(1000)
DECLARE @sql VARCHAR(8000)

DECLARE @field VARCHAR(500)
DECLARE @values VARCHAR(500)
declare @idx分号 int
declare @idx竖线 int
declare @slice VARCHAR(50)
declare @tempValue varchar(50)


set @搅拌站 = '搅拌站1'
DECLARE mycursor_搅拌站1 CURSOR  
FOR  
    SELECT 任务编号,@搅拌站 as 搅拌站,备用15 FROM dbo.a_搅拌站_配比搅拌站1  
    
OPEN mycursor_搅拌站1  --打开游标       
--从游标里取出数据赋值到我们刚才声明的变量中(移动游标指向到第一条数据，提取第一条数据存放在变量中)    
FETCH NEXT FROM mycursor_搅拌站1 INTO @任务编号, @搅拌站,@备用15

WHILE (@@fetch_status = 0)   --如果上一次操作成功则继续循环
    BEGIN        
        --显示出我们每次用游标取出的值     
        --print (@Id+'--------'+@UserName+'--------'+@Password+'----'+@NickName)
        --条件判断
        set @field=''
		set @values=''
        while @备用15 is not null and @备用15 != ''
        begin
			--print @备用15
			set @idx分号 = charindex(';',@备用15,0)
			if @idx分号 > 0 
			begin
				set @slice = LEFT(@备用15, @idx分号 - 1)
				set @备用15 = SUBSTRING(@备用15, @idx分号 + 1, LEN(@备用15))
			end
			else
			begin
				set @slice = @备用15
				set @备用15 = ''
			end

			set @idx竖线 = charindex('|',@slice)
			if @idx竖线 > 0
			begin
				set @field = @field + LEFT(@slice, @idx竖线 - 1) + ','
				set @tempValue = SUBSTRING(@slice, @idx竖线 + 1, LEN(@slice))
				if @tempValue is null
					set @values = @values + 'null,'
				else
					set @values = @values + '''' + @tempValue + ''','
			end	
        end
        if @field != ''
        begin
			SET @sql = 'INSERT INTO [a_临时_搅拌站1](任务编号,搅拌站,' + left(@field, LEN(@field) - 1) + ') values('''+@任务编号 + ''',''' + @搅拌站 + ''',' + left(@values, LEN(@values) - 1) + ')'
			exec(@sql)
			--print @sql
		end

        --用游标去取下一条记录(继续取下一行数据)
        FETCH NEXT FROM mycursor_搅拌站1 INTO @任务编号, @搅拌站,@备用15 
    END
  
CLOSE mycursor_搅拌站1 --关闭游标     
DEALLOCATE mycursor_搅拌站1 --撤销游标(释放资源 )   


set @搅拌站 = '搅拌站2'
DECLARE mycursor_搅拌站2 CURSOR  
FOR  
    SELECT 任务编号,@搅拌站 as 搅拌站,备用15 FROM dbo.a_搅拌站_配比搅拌站2  
    
OPEN mycursor_搅拌站2  --打开游标       
--从游标里取出数据赋值到我们刚才声明的变量中(移动游标指向到第一条数据，提取第一条数据存放在变量中)    
FETCH NEXT FROM mycursor_搅拌站2 INTO @任务编号, @搅拌站,@备用15

WHILE (@@fetch_status = 0)   --如果上一次操作成功则继续循环
    BEGIN        
        --显示出我们每次用游标取出的值     
        --print (@Id+'--------'+@UserName+'--------'+@Password+'----'+@NickName)
        --条件判断
        set @field=''
		set @values=''
        while @备用15 is not null and @备用15 != ''
        begin
			--print @备用15
			set @idx分号 = charindex(';',@备用15,0)
			if @idx分号 > 0 
			begin
				set @slice = LEFT(@备用15, @idx分号 - 1)
				set @备用15 = SUBSTRING(@备用15, @idx分号 + 1, LEN(@备用15))
			end
			else
			begin
				set @slice = @备用15
				set @备用15 = ''
			end

			set @idx竖线 = charindex('|',@slice)
			if @idx竖线 > 0
			begin
				set @field = @field + LEFT(@slice, @idx竖线 - 1) + ','
				set @tempValue = SUBSTRING(@slice, @idx竖线 + 1, LEN(@slice))
				if @tempValue is null
					set @values = @values + 'null,'
				else
					set @values = @values + '''' + @tempValue + ''','
			end	
        end
        if @field != ''
        begin
			SET @sql = 'INSERT INTO [a_临时_搅拌站2](任务编号,搅拌站,' + left(@field, LEN(@field) - 1) + ') values('''+@任务编号 + ''',''' + @搅拌站 + ''',' + left(@values, LEN(@values) - 1) + ')'
			exec(@sql)
			--print @sql
		end

        --用游标去取下一条记录(继续取下一行数据)
        FETCH NEXT FROM mycursor_搅拌站2 INTO @任务编号, @搅拌站,@备用15 
    END
  
CLOSE mycursor_搅拌站2 --关闭游标     
DEALLOCATE mycursor_搅拌站2 --撤销游标(释放资源 )   


set @搅拌站 = '搅拌站3'

FOR  
    SELECT 任务编号,@搅拌站 as 搅拌站,备用15 FROM dbo.a_搅拌站_配比搅拌站3

WHILE (@@fetch_status = 0)   --如果上一次操作成功则继续循环
    BEGIN        
        --显示出我们每次用游标取出的值     
        --print (@Id+'--------'+@UserName+'--------'+@Password+'----'+@NickName)

			begin
				set @slice = LEFT(@备用15, @idx分号 - 1)
				set @备用15 = SUBSTRING(@备用15, @idx分号 + 1, LEN(@备用15))
			end
			else
			begin
				set @slice = @备用15
				set @备用15 = ''
			end

			set @idx竖线 = charindex('|',@slice)
			if @idx竖线 > 0
			begin
				set @field = @field + LEFT(@slice, @idx竖线 - 1) + ','
				set @tempValue = SUBSTRING(@slice, @idx竖线 + 1, LEN(@slice))
				if @tempValue is null
					set @values = @values + 'null,'
				else
					set @values = @values + '''' + @tempValue + ''','
			end	
        end
        if @field != ''

			SET @sql = 'INSERT INTO [a_临时_搅拌站3](任务编号,搅拌站,' + left(@field, LEN(@field) - 1) + ') values('''+@任务编号 + ''',''' + @搅拌站 + ''',' + left(@values, LEN(@values) - 1) + ')'

		end

        FETCH NEXT FROM mycursor_搅拌站3 INTO @任务编号, @搅拌站,@备用15 
    END
  
CLOSE mycursor_搅拌站3 --关闭游标

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比标准]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比标准]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比标准]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS 任务编号,c50f1 AS 搅拌站,c50f2 AS 混泥土级别,c50f3 AS 水泥分配比,c50f4 AS 砂分配比,c50f5 AS 石分配比,c50f6 AS 外加剂分配比,c50f7 AS 水分配比,c50f8 AS 选用配比编号,c50f9 AS 检查标准,c50f10 AS 检查结果,c50f11 AS 审核人,c50f12 AS 审核端,c50f13 AS 审核意见,c50f14 AS 批准人,c50f15 AS 审批状态,c50f16 AS 料舱1名称,c50f17 AS 料舱1规格,c50f18 AS 料舱1备注,c50f19 AS 料舱2名称,c50f20 AS 料舱2规格,c50f21 AS 料舱2备注,c50f22 AS 料舱3名称,c50f23 AS 料舱3规格,c50f24 AS 料舱3备注,c50f25 AS 料舱4名称,c50f26 AS 料舱4规格,c50f27 AS 料舱4备注,c50f28 AS 料舱5名称,c50f29 AS 料舱5规格,c50f30 AS 料舱5备注,c50f31 AS 料舱6名称,c50f32 AS 料舱6规格,c50f33 AS 料舱6备注,c50f34 AS 料舱7名称,c50f35 AS 料舱7规格,c50f36 AS 料舱7备注,c50f37 AS 料舱8名称,c50f38 AS 料舱8规格,c50f39 AS 料舱8备注,c50f40 AS 料舱9名称,c50f41 AS 料舱9规格,c50f42 AS 料舱9备注,c50f43 AS 料舱10名称,c50f44 AS 料舱10规格,c50f45 AS 料舱10备注,c50f46 AS 料舱11名称,c50f47 AS 料舱11规格,c50f48 AS 料舱11备注,c50f49 AS 料舱12名称,c50f50 AS 料舱12规格,c50f51 AS 料舱12备注,c50f52 AS 料舱13名称,c50f53 AS 料舱13规格,c50f54 AS 料舱13备注,c50f55 AS 料舱14名称,c50f56 AS 料舱14规格,c50f57 AS 料舱14备注,c200f0 AS 试验室输配比提示,df0 AS 审核时间,if0 AS 审核标志,if1 AS 搅拌时间,nf0 AS 水灰比,nf1 AS 用水量,nf2 AS 容重,nf3 AS 砂率,nf4 AS 外加剂掺量,nf5 AS 防冻剂掺量,nf6 AS 粉煤灰掺量,nf7 AS 矿粉掺量,nf8 AS 膨胀剂掺量,nf9 AS 早强剂掺量,nf10 AS 硅灰掺量,nf11 AS 超细砂掺量,nf12 AS 附加掺量1,nf13 AS 附加掺量2,nf14 AS 水泥取代率,nf15 AS 粉煤灰超量取代系数,nf16 AS 胶料量,nf17 AS 骨料量,nf18 AS 水泥量,nf19 AS 粉煤灰量,nf20 AS 矿粉量,nf21 AS 膨胀剂量,nf22 AS 早强剂量,nf23 AS 外加剂量,nf24 AS 防冻剂量,nf25 AS 砂子量,nf26 AS 石子量,nf27 AS 硅灰量,nf28 AS 超细砂量,nf29 AS 附加量1,nf30 AS 附加量2,nf31 AS 总重量,nf32 AS 料舱1量,nf33 AS 料舱1干料,nf34 AS 料舱1含水率,nf35 AS 料舱1仿真量,nf36 AS 料舱1设计值,nf37 AS 料舱1含石率,nf38 AS 料舱2量,nf39 AS 料舱2干料,nf40 AS 料舱2含水率,nf41 AS 料舱2仿真量,nf42 AS 料舱2设计值,nf43 AS 料舱2含石率,nf44 AS 料舱3量,nf45 AS 料舱3干料,nf46 AS AS 料舱5设计值,nf61 AS 料舱5含石率,nf62 AS 料舱6量,nf63 AS 料舱6干料,nf64 AS 料舱6含水率,nf65 AS 料舱6仿真量,nf66 AS 料舱6设计值,nf67 AS 料舱6含石率,nf68 AS 料舱7量,nf69 AS 料舱7干料,nf70 AS 料舱7含水率,nf71 AS 料舱7仿真量,nf72 AS 料舱7设计值,nf73 AS 料舱7含石率,nf74 AS 料舱8量,nf75 AS 料舱8干料,nf76 AS 料舱8含水率,nf77 AS 料舱8仿真量,nf78 AS 料舱8设计值,nf79 AS 料舱8含石率,nf80 AS 料舱9量,nf81 AS 料舱9干料,nf82 AS 料舱9含水率,nf83 AS 料舱9仿真量,nf84 AS 料舱9设计值,nf85 AS 料舱9含石率,nf86 AS 料舱10量,nf87 AS 料舱10干料,nf88 AS 料舱10含水率,nf89 AS 料舱10仿真量,nf90 AS 料舱10设计值,nf91 AS 料舱10含石率,nf92 AS 料舱11量,nf93 AS 料舱11干料,nf94 AS 料舱11含水率,nf95 AS 料舱11仿真量,nf96 AS 料舱11设计值,nf97 AS 料舱11含石率,nf98 AS 料舱12量,nf99 AS 料舱12干料,nf100 AS 料舱12含水率,nf101 AS 料舱12仿真量,nf102 AS 料舱12设计值,nf103 AS 料舱12含石率,nf104 AS 料舱13量,nf105 AS 料舱13干料,nf106 AS 料舱13含水率,nf107 AS 料舱13仿真量,nf108 AS 料舱13设计值,nf109 AS 料舱13含石率,nf110 AS 料舱14量,nf111 AS 料舱14干料,nf112 AS 料舱14含水率,nf113 AS 料舱14仿真量,nf114 AS 料舱14设计值,nf115 AS 料舱14含石率,create_time AS 创建时间,create_person AS 创建人,create_position AS 创建端,update_time AS 修改时间,update_person AS 修改人,update_position AS 修改端,biaotimingcheng AS 标题名称
    FROM dbo.jbz_pei_bi_biao_zhun

GO

GO

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[findValueByField]') and xtype in (N'FN', N'IF', N'TF'))
drop function [dbo].[findValueByField]
GO


CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[findValueByField](
	@fieldValue varchar(500), 
	@findValue varchar(50)
)
RETURNS VARCHAR(50)
AS 
BEGIN
	declare @retuanValue varchar(50)
	declare @splitValue varchar(50)
	select @splitValue = items from dbo.functionSplit(@fieldValue, ';') where items like @findValue + '%'	
	select @retuanValue=items from dbo.functionSplit(@splitValue, '|') where items != @findValue
	RETURN @retuanValue
END

GO


insert into txt(txt) values('1号站配比')

			[料舱13含石率],
			[料舱14量],
			[料舱14干料],
			[料舱14含水率],
			[料舱14仿真量],
			料舱14干料 [料舱14设计值],
			[料舱14含石率],
			NULL [创建时间],
			NULL [创建人],
			NULL [创建端],
			NULL [修改时间],
			NULL [修改人],
			NULL [修改端]
	from a_搅拌站_配比搅拌站5 
		left join a_临时_搅拌站5 on a_搅拌站_配比搅拌站5.任务编号 = a_临时_搅拌站5.任务编号

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比砂浆明细]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比砂浆明细]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

        CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比砂浆明细]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS 任务编号,c50f1 AS 搅拌站,c50f2 AS 混泥土级别,c50f3 AS 料舱1名称,c50f4 AS 料舱1规格,c50f5 AS 料舱1备注,c50f6 AS 料舱2名称,c50f7 AS 料舱2规格,c50f8 AS 料舱2备注,c50f9 AS 料舱3名称,c50f10 AS 料舱3规格,c50f11 AS 料舱3备注,c50f12 AS 料舱4名称,c50f13 AS 料舱4规格,c50f14 AS 料舱4备注,c50f15 AS 料舱5名称,c50f16 AS 料舱5规格,c50f17 AS 料舱5备注,c50f18 AS 料舱6名称,c50f19 AS 料舱6规格,c50f20 AS 料舱6备注,c50f21 AS 料舱7名称,c50f22 AS 料舱7规格,c50f23 AS 料舱7备注,c50f24 AS 料舱8名称,c50f25 AS 料舱8规格,c50f26 AS 料舱8备注,c50f27 AS 料舱9名称,c50f28 AS 料舱9规格,c50f29 AS 料舱9备注,c50f30 AS 料舱10名称,c50f31 AS 料舱10规格,c50f32 AS 料舱10备注,c50f33 AS 料舱11名称,c50f34 AS 料舱11规格,c50f35 AS 料舱11备注,c50f36 AS 料舱12名称,c50f37 AS 料舱12规格,c50f38 AS 料舱12备注,c50f39 AS 料舱13名称,c50f40 AS 料舱13规格,c50f41 AS 料舱13备注,c50f42 AS 料舱14名称,c50f43 AS 料舱14规格,c50f44 AS 料舱14备注,nf0 AS 料舱1量,nf1 AS 料舱1干料,nf2 AS 料舱1含水率,nf3 AS 料舱1仿真量,nf4 AS 料舱1设计值,nf5 AS 料舱2量,nf6 AS 料舱2干料,nf7 AS 料舱2含水率,nf8 AS 料舱2仿真量,nf9 AS 料舱2设计值,nf10 AS 料舱3量,nf11 AS 料舱3干料,nf12 AS 料舱3含水率,nf13 AS 料舱3仿真量,nf14 AS 料舱3设计值,nf15 AS 料舱4量,nf16 AS 料舱4干料,nf17 AS 料舱4含水率,nf18 AS 料舱4仿真量,nf19 AS 料舱4设计值,nf20 AS 料舱5量,nf21 AS 料舱5干料,nf22 AS 料舱5含水率,nf23 AS 料舱5仿真量,nf24 AS 料舱5设计值,nf25 AS 料舱6量,nf26 AS 料舱6干料,nf27 AS 料舱6含水率,nf28 AS 料舱6仿真量,nf29 AS 料舱6设计值,nf30 AS 料舱7量,nf31 AS 料舱7干料,nf32 AS 料舱7含水率,nf33 AS 料舱7仿真量,nf34 AS 料舱7设计值,nf35 AS 料舱8量,nf36 AS 料舱8干料,nf37 AS 料舱8含水率,nf38 AS 料舱8仿真量,nf39 AS 料舱8设计值,nf40 AS 料舱9量,nf41 AS 料舱9干料,nf42 AS 料舱9含水率,nf43 AS 料舱9仿真量,nf44 AS 料舱9设计值,nf45 AS 料舱10量,nf46 AS 料舱10干料,nf47 AS 料舱10含水率,nf48 AS 料舱10仿真量,nf49 AS 料舱10设计值,nf50 AS 料舱11量,nf51 AS 料舱11干料,nf52 AS 料舱11含水率,nf53 AS 料舱11仿真量,nf54 AS 料舱11设计值,nf55 AS 料舱12量,nf56 AS 料舱12干料,nf57 AS 料舱12含水率,nf58 AS 料舱12仿真量,nf59 AS 料舱12设计值,nf60 AS 料舱13量,nf61 AS 料舱13干料,nf62 AS 料舱13含水率,nf63 AS 料舱13仿真量,nf64 AS 料舱13设计值,nf65 AS 料舱14量,nf66 AS 料舱14干料,nf67 AS 料舱14含水率,nf68 AS 料舱14仿真量,nf69 AS 料舱14设计值,create_time AS 创建时间,create_person AS 创建人,create_position AS 创建端,update_time AS 修改时间,update_person AS 修改人,update_position AS 修改端,xuanyongbianhao AS 选用配比编号
    FROM dbo.jbz_pei_bi_sha_jiang_ming_xi

GO

insert into txt(txt) values('1号站砂浆配比')

declare @搅拌站名称_配比砂浆 varchar(50)
select @搅拌站名称_配比砂浆 = 显示名称  from cv_搅拌站_搅拌站 where 搅拌站标识 = '搅拌站1'
if @搅拌站名称_配比砂浆 is not null and @搅拌站名称_配比砂浆 != '' 
	insert into [cv_搅拌站_配比砂浆明细] 
		select [任务编号],
			@搅拌站名称_配比砂浆 [搅拌站],
			[混泥土级别],
			[料舱1名称],
			[料舱1规格],
			备用1 [料舱1备注],
			[料舱2名称],

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[jbz_pei_bi_zhu_biao]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)
	drop table [jbz_pei_bi_zhu_biao]
GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[jbz_pei_bi_zhu_biao](
	[c50f0] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[c50f1] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f2] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f3] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f4] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[df0] [datetime] NULL,
	[df1] [datetime] NULL,
	[if0] [bigint] NULL,
	[if1] [bigint] NULL,
	[if2] [bigint] NULL,
	[nf0] [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	[nf1] [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	[nf2] [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	[nf3] [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
	[nf4] [numeric](18, 3) NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_jbz_pei_bi_zhu_biao] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[c50f0] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]






IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比主表]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比主表]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比主表]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS 任务编号,if0 AS 是否统一配比,nf0 AS 砼密度,nf1 AS 砂浆密度
    FROM dbo.jbz_pei_bi_zhu_biao

GO

insert into cv_搅拌站_配比主表 select a_搅拌站_配比密度.任务编号, case when [是否统一配比] = '是' then 1 else 0 end [是否统一配比], 砼密度, [砂浆密度] from a_搅拌站_配比密度 left join a_搅拌站_配比是否使用同一配比 on a_搅拌站_配比密度.任务编号 = a_搅拌站_配比是否使用同一配比.任务编号

	[nf6] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf7] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf8] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf9] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf10] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[c50f0] ASC,
	[c50f1] ASC
	
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]


IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS [搅拌站标识],c50f1 AS [罐标识],c50f2 AS [搅拌站],c50f3 AS [材料名称],c50f4 AS [规格],c50f5 AS [罐名称],c50f6 AS [显示方式],c50f7 AS [用户名称],c50f8 AS [手持机卸料地],if0 AS [是否使用],if1 AS [是否显示],if2 AS [是否开通],if3 AS [显示次序],nf0 AS [配料上限]
    FROM dbo.jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun

GO

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)
	drop table 搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)
	drop table 搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计




if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_he_ji]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)
	drop table [jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_he_ji]
GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_he_ji](
	[c50f0] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[c50f1] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[c50f2] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f3] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f4] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f5] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f6] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f7] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f8] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f9] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f10] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c200f0] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[c200f1] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[c200f2] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[df0] [datetime] NULL,
	[df1] [datetime] NULL,
	[df2] [datetime] NULL,
	[df3] [datetime] NULL,
	[df4] [datetime] NULL,
	[df5] [datetime] NULL,
	[if0] [bigint] NULL,
	[if1] [bigint] NULL,
	[if2] [bigint] NULL,
	[if3] [bigint] NULL,
	[if4] [bigint] NULL,
	[if5] [bigint] NULL,
	[if6] [bigint] NULL,
	[if7] [bigint] NULL,
	[if8] [bigint] NULL,
	[if9] [bigint] NULL,
	[if10] [bigint] NULL,
	[nf0] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf1] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf2] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf3] [numeric](18, 8) NULL,
	[nf4] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf5] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf6] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf7] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf8] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf9] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf10] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_he_ji] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED

	[c50f0] ASC,
	[c50f1] ASC
	
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]



IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计]
GO

GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS [搅拌站标识],c50f1 AS [罐标识],c50f2 AS [搅拌站],c50f3 AS [最后一车进货品名],c50f4 AS [最后一车进货规格],c50f5 AS [Setting],df0 AS [最后一车进货时间],df1 AS [敲罐时间],df2 AS [更改库存时间],if0 AS [控件索引],if1 AS [X],if2 AS [Y],if3 AS [Width],if4 AS [Height],if5 AS [Color],nf0 AS [敲罐量],nf1 AS [最大值],nf2 AS [最小值],nf3 AS [当前值]
    FROM dbo.jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_he_ji

GO


if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[aaaSave搅拌站数据]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1)
drop procedure [dbo].[aaaSave搅拌站数据]
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[aaaSave搅拌站数据]
	@搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 varchar(50)
 AS
	declare @启用仓列表_维护罐信息 varchar(500)
	set @启用仓列表_维护罐信息 = '骨料1,骨料2,骨料3,骨料4,骨料5,骨料6,骨料7,粉料1,粉料2,粉料3,粉料4,粉料5,粉料6,粉料7,粉料8,外加剂1,外加剂2,外加剂3,外加剂4,外加剂5,外加剂6,外加剂7,外加剂8,水1,水2,水3,'
	declare @搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 varchar(50)
	select @搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 = 显示名称 from cv_搅拌站_搅拌站 where 搅拌站标识 = @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息
	if @搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 is not null
		begin
			if @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 = '搅拌站1'
			BEGIN
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[材料名称],[规格],[罐名称],[显示方式],[用户名称],[手持机卸料地],[是否使用],[是否显示],[是否开通],[显示次序],[配料上限])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],材料名称1 AS [材料名称],规格1 AS [规格],罐名称1 AS [罐名称],'筒仓' AS [显示方式],'' [用户名称], NULL AS [手持机卸料地],[是否使用],字段名称 AS [是否显示],1 [是否开通],[显示次序],NULL [配料上限]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站1 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站1 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站1.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站1.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限1 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站1.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限1.料仓名称
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[最后一车进货品名],[最后一车进货规格],[Setting],[最后一车进货时间],[敲罐时间],[更改库存时间],[控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],NULL [最后一车进货品名],NULL [最后一车进货规格],[Setting],NULL [最后一车进货时间],
					[敲罐时间],NULL [更改库存时间],NULL [控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站1 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站1 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站1.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站1.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限1 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站1.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限1.料仓名称
			END
			ELSE if @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 = '搅拌站2'
			BEGIN
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[材料名称],[规格],[罐名称],[显示方式],[用户名称],[手持机卸料地],[是否使用],[是否显示],[是否开通],[显示次序],[配料上限])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],材料名称1 AS [材料名称],规格1 AS [规格],罐名称1 AS [罐名称],'筒仓' AS [显示方式],'' [用户名称], NULL AS [手持机卸料地],[是否使用],字段名称 AS [是否显示],1 [是否开通],[显示次序],NULL [配料上限]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站2 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站2 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站2.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站2.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限2 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站2.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限2.料仓名称
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[最后一车进货品名],[最后一车进货规格],[Setting],[最后一车进货时间],[敲罐时间],[更改库存时间],[控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],NULL [最后一车进货品名],NULL [最后一车进货规格],[Setting],NULL [最后一车进货时间],
					[敲罐时间],NULL [更改库存时间],NULL [控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站2 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站2 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站2.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站2.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限2 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站2.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限2.料仓名称
			END
			ELSE if @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 = '搅拌站3'
			BEGIN
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[材料名称],[规格],[罐名称],[显示方式],[用户名称],[手持机卸料地],[是否使用],[是否显示],[是否开通],[显示次序],[配料上限])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],材料名称1 AS [材料名称],规格1 AS [规格],罐名称1 AS [罐名称],'筒仓' AS [显示方式],'' [用户名称], NULL AS [手持机卸料地],[是否使用],字段名称 AS [是否显示],1 [是否开通],[显示次序],NULL [配料上限]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站3 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站3 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站3.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站3.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限3 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站3.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限3.料仓名称
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[最后一车进货品名],[最后一车进货规格],[Setting],[最后一车进货时间],[敲罐时间],[更改库存时间],[控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],NULL [最后一车进货品名],NULL [最后一车进货规格],[Setting],NULL [最后一车进货时间],
					[敲罐时间],NULL [更改库存时间],NULL [控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站3 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站3 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站3.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站3.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限3 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站3.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限3.料仓名称
			END
			ELSE if @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 = '搅拌站4'
			BEGIN
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[材料名称],[规格],[罐名称],[显示方式],[用户名称],[手持机卸料地],[是否使用],[是否显示],[是否开通],[显示次序],[配料上限])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],材料名称1 AS [材料名称],规格1 AS [规格],罐名称1 AS [罐名称],'筒仓' AS [显示方式],'' [用户名称], NULL AS [手持机卸料地],[是否使用],字段名称 AS [是否显示],1 [是否开通],[显示次序],NULL [配料上限]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站4 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站4 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站4.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站4.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限4 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站4.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限4.料仓名称
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[最后一车进货品名],[最后一车进货规格],[Setting],[最后一车进货时间],[敲罐时间],[更改库存时间],[控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],NULL [最后一车进货品名],NULL [最后一车进货规格],[Setting],NULL [最后一车进货时间],
					[敲罐时间],NULL [更改库存时间],NULL [控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站4 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站4 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站4.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站4.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限4 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站4.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限4.料仓名称
			END
			ELSE if @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 = '搅拌站5'
			BEGIN
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[材料名称],[规格],[罐名称],[显示方式],[用户名称],[手持机卸料地],[是否使用],[是否显示],[是否开通],[显示次序],[配料上限])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],材料名称1 AS [材料名称],规格1 AS [规格],罐名称1 AS [罐名称],'筒仓' AS [显示方式],'' [用户名称], NULL AS [手持机卸料地],[是否使用],字段名称 AS [是否显示],1 [是否开通],[显示次序],NULL [配料上限]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站5 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站5 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站5.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站5.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限5 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站5.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限5.料仓名称
				insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[最后一车进货品名],[最后一车进货规格],[Setting],[最后一车进货时间],[敲罐时间],[更改库存时间],[控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值])
					select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站标识],对应罐名称 AS [罐标识],@搅拌站名称_维护罐信息 AS [搅拌站],NULL [最后一车进货品名],NULL [最后一车进货规格],[Setting],NULL [最后一车进货时间],
					[敲罐时间],NULL [更改库存时间],NULL [控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值]
					from a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站5 
						left join a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站5 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站5.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_数据库字段对应关系搅拌站5.标题名称
						left join a_搅拌站_料仓上限5 on a_搅拌站_材料对应搅拌站5.对应罐名称 = a_搅拌站_料仓上限5.料仓名称
			END
		end

	insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[材料名称],[规格],[罐名称],[显示方式],[用户名称],[手持机卸料地],[是否使用],[是否显示],[是否开通],[显示次序],[配料上限])
	
		select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 as 搅拌站标识, items as 罐标识, NULL 搅拌站,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL
		from dbo.functionSplit(@启用仓列表_维护罐信息, ',') a 
			left join (select * from cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存 where 搅拌站标识 = @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 ) b on a.items = b.罐标识
		where b.搅拌站标识 is null
	insert into cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计([搅拌站标识],[罐标识],[搅拌站],[最后一车进货品名],[最后一车进货规格],[Setting],[最后一车进货时间],[敲罐时间],[更改库存时间],[控件索引],[X],[Y],[Width],[Height],[Color],[敲罐量],[最大值],[最小值],[当前值])
		select @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 as 搅拌站标识, items as 罐标识, NULL 搅拌站,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL
		from dbo.functionSplit(@启用仓列表_维护罐信息, ',') a 
			left join (select * from cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计 where 搅拌站标识 = @搅拌站标识_维护罐信息 ) b on a.items = b.罐标识
		where b.搅拌站标识 is null

GO

update cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计 set
	[最后一车进货品名]=b.品名,
	[最后一车进货规格]=b.规格,
	[最后一车进货时间]=b.进货时间
from (select 进货时间, a_过磅_进货单.品名, a_过磅_进货单.规格, 卸料地 , 搅拌站标识,罐标识
		from a_过磅_进货单 
			LEFT JOIN cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存 ON a_过磅_进货单.卸料地 = cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存.罐名称
		where 进货单号 in(select  进货单号 
							from (select max(进货单号) 进货单号, 卸料地 
									from  a_过磅_进货单
									where 卸料地!='' group by 卸料地) a) ) b 
where cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计.搅拌站标识 = b.搅拌站标识 AND cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计.罐标识 = b.罐标识

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_huan_cun_biao]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)
	drop table [jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_huan_cun_biao]
GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_huan_cun_biao](
	[c50f0] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f1] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f2] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f3] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f4] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f5] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[df0] [datetime] NULL,
	[df1] [datetime] NULL,
	[if0] [bigint] NULL,
	[if1] [bigint] NULL,
	[if2] [bigint] NULL,
	[nf0] [numeric](18, 2) NULL,
	[nf1] [numeric](18, 2) NULL)
	

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存缓存表]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存缓存表]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存缓存表]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS 搅拌站标识,c50f1 AS 罐标识,c50f2 AS 罐名称,c50f3 AS 用户名称,if0 AS 显示次序
    FROM dbo.jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_ji_ku_cun_huan_cun_biao

GO

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_上次使用物料]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_上次使用物料]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_上次使用物料]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS 搅拌站标识,c50f1 AS 搅拌站,c50f2 AS 骨料1名称,c50f3 AS 骨料1规格,c50f4 AS 骨料2名称,c50f5 AS 骨料2规格,c50f6 AS 骨料3名称,c50f7 AS 骨料3规格,c50f8 AS 骨料4名称,c50f9 AS 骨料4规格,c50f10 AS 骨料5名称,c50f11 AS 骨料5规格,c50f12 AS 骨料6名称,c50f13 AS 骨料6规格,c50f14 AS 骨料7名称,c50f15 AS 骨料7规格,c50f16 AS 骨料8名称,c50f17 AS 骨料8规格,c50f18 AS 骨料9名称,c50f19 AS 骨料9规格,c50f20 AS 骨料10名称,c50f21 AS 骨料10规格,c50f22 AS 粉料1名称,c50f23 AS 粉料1规格,c50f24 AS 粉料2名称,c50f25 AS 粉料2规格,c50f26 AS 粉料3名称,c50f27 AS 粉料3规格,c50f28 AS 粉料4名称,c50f29 AS 粉料4规格,c50f30 AS 粉料5名称,c50f31 AS 粉料5规格,c50f32 AS 粉料6名称,c50f33 AS 粉料6规格,c50f34 AS 粉料7名称,c50f35 AS 粉料7规格,c50f36 AS 粉料8名称,c50f37 AS 粉料8规格,c50f38 AS 粉料9名称,c50f39 AS 粉料9规格,c50f40 AS 粉料10名称,c50f41 AS 粉料10规格,c50f42 AS 外加剂1名称,c50f43 AS 外加剂1规格,c50f44 AS 外加剂2名称,c50f45 AS 外加剂2规格,c50f46 AS 外加剂3名称,c50f47 AS 外加剂3规格,c50f48 AS 外加剂4名称,c50f49 AS 外加剂4规格,c50f50 AS 外加剂5名称,c50f51 AS 外加剂5规格,c50f52 AS 外加剂6名称,c50f53 AS 外加剂6规格,c50f54 AS 外加剂7名称,c50f55 AS 外加剂7规格,c50f56 AS 外加剂8名称,c50f57 AS 外加剂8规格,c50f58 AS 外加剂9名称,c50f59 AS 外加剂9规格,c50f60 AS 外加剂10名称,c50f61 AS 外加剂10规格,c50f62 AS 水1名称,c50f63 AS 水1规格,c50f64 AS 水2名称,c50f65 AS 水2规格,c50f66 AS 水3名称,c50f67 AS 水3规格
    FROM dbo.jbz_shang_ci_shi_yong_wu_liao

GO

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_gong_yong_cang]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_gong_yong_cang](
	[c50f0] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[c50f1] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[c50f2] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[c50f3] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f4] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f5] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f6] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f7] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f8] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f9] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f10] [varchar](50) NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_gong_yong_cang] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[c50f0] ASC,
	[c50f1] ASC,
	[c50f2] ASC

	
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]


IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息公用仓]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息公用仓]


SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息公用仓]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS [公用仓标识],c50f1 AS [搅拌站标识],c50f2 AS [罐标识],c50f3 AS [增减方式]
    FROM dbo.jbz_wei_hu_guan_xin_xi_gong_yong_cang

GO




if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[搅拌站_材料顺序]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)
	drop table 搅拌站_材料顺序



if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)
	drop table [jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu]
GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu](
	[id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[c50f0] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[c50f1] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f2] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f3] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[c50f4] [varchar](50) NULL)
	

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_材料顺序]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_材料顺序]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_材料顺序]
    AS
    SELECT 
id AS id,c50f0 AS 料名,c50f1 AS 序号,c50f2 AS 类型
    FROM dbo.jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu

GO




IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.indexes WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu]') AND name = N'IX_jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu')
DROP INDEX [IX_jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu] ON [dbo].[jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu] WITH ( ONLINE = OFF )
GO


/****** Object:  Index [IX_jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu]    Script Date: 05/13/2021 21:21:44 ******/
CREATE UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu] ON [dbo].[jbz_cai_liao_shun_xu] 
(
	[c50f0] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
GO


insert into cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) select 料名, isnull(序号, 0), '' 类型 from a_搅拌站_材料顺序


if not exists ( SELECT * FROM 系统_通用编辑模块 WHERE (mdl = '维护罐信息材料名称'))
	insert into 系统_通用编辑模块(mdl, isql, icaption, ikey,iid) values('维护罐信息材料名称', 'SELECT [id],[料名],[序号],[类型]  FROM [dbo].[搅拌站_材料顺序]', '维护罐信息材料名称', 'id', 1)


declare @max序号 int
select @max序号 = MAX(序号) from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序
if @max序号 is null
	set @max序号 = 0

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '水')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('水', @max序号, '')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '砂子')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('砂子', @max序号, '骨料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '石子')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('石子', @max序号, '骨料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '碎屑')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('碎屑', @max序号, '骨料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '尾矿石')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('尾矿石', @max序号, '骨料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '煤矸石')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('煤矸石', @max序号, '骨料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '水泥')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('水泥', @max序号, '胶料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '矿粉')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('矿粉', @max序号, '胶料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '粉煤灰')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('粉煤灰', @max序号, '胶料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '硅灰')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('硅灰', @max序号, '胶料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '超细砂')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('超细砂', @max序号, '胶料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '膨胀剂')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('膨胀剂', @max序号, '胶料')
	end


if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '早强剂')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('早强剂', @max序号, '胶料')
	end

if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '防冻剂')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('防冻剂', @max序号, '外加剂')
	end


if not exists(select * from cv_搅拌站_材料顺序 where 料名 = '外加剂')
	begin
	set @max序号 = @max序号 + 1
	insert cv_搅拌站_材料顺序(料名, 序号, 类型) values('外加剂', @max序号, '外加剂')
	end

DELETE FROM cv_系统_参数设置 WHERE (项目 = '配比界面罐显示方式')
DELETE FROM cv_系统_参数设置 WHERE (项目 = '配比界面罐显示默认')


IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.triggers WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[TR_jbz_jiao_ban_zhan_xiu_gai_ming_cheng]'))
DROP TRIGGER [dbo].[TR_jbz_jiao_ban_zhan_xiu_gai_ming_cheng]
GO

CREATE TRIGGER [dbo].[TR_jbz_jiao_ban_zhan_xiu_gai_ming_cheng] ON [dbo].[jbz_jiao_ban_zhan] 
FOR UPDATE
AS
	return
	UPDATE cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存
		SET 搅拌站 = inserted.c50f1
	FROM inserted
	WHERE cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存.搅拌站标识 = inserted.c50f0 
	
	UPDATE cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计
		SET 搅拌站 = inserted.c50f1
	FROM inserted
	WHERE cv_搅拌站_维护罐信息及库存合计.搅拌站标识 = inserted.c50f0 
	--update jbz_jiao_ban_zhan SET 显示名称 = '特种砂浆' where 搅拌站标识 = '搅拌站4'
GO

declare @砼折砂浆系数组 varchar(100)
select @砼折砂浆系数组 = 值  from cv_系统_参数设置 where 项目 = '砼配比转砂浆配比系数'
if @砼折砂浆系数组 is NULL
	set @砼折砂浆系数组 = ''
if @砼折砂浆系数组 NOT LIKE '%水%'
	set @砼折砂浆系数组 = '水:1.0;水泥:1.0'
if not exists(select * from cv_系统_参数设置 where 项目 = '砼折砂浆系数组')
	insert into cv_系统_参数设置(项目,值,选项,可否设置,所属系统,参数类型) values ('砼折砂浆系数组', @砼折砂浆系数组, '水:1.0;水泥:1.0', 1, '试验', 'str')
delete from cv_系统_参数设置 where 项目 = '砼配比转砂浆配比系数'


IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[functionSplitToKeyAndValue]') AND type in (N'FN', N'IF', N'TF', N'FS', N'FT'))
DROP FUNCTION [dbo].[functionSplitToKeyAndValue]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[functionSplitToKeyAndValue](@String varchar(8000), @Delimiter char(1),@FieldDelimiter char(1))
returns @temptable TABLE (keyName varchar(50),val varchar(50))
as
begin
    declare @idx int
    declare @slice varchar(8000)
    select @idx = 1
          if len(@String)<1 or @String is null return
    while @idx!= 0
    begin
        set @idx =charindex(@Delimiter,@String)
        if @idx!=0
            set @slice =left(@String,@idx - 1)
        else
            set @slice = @String
        if(len(@slice)>0)
        begin
            declare @fieldIdx int
            declare @keyName varchar(50)
			declare @val varchar(50)
			
            set @fieldIdx = charindex(@FieldDelimiter,@slice)
            if @fieldIdx!= 0
            begin
				set @keyName =left(@slice,@fieldIdx - 1)
				set @val = RIGHT(@slice, LEN(@slice) - @fieldIdx)
				insert into @temptable values(@keyName, @val)
            end
            else
            begin
				set @keyName =@slice
				set @val = ''
				insert into @temptable values(@keyName, @val)
            end
        end
        set @String =right(@String,len(@String)- @idx)
        if len(@String)= 0 break
    end
return
end
GO


UPDATE a_搅拌站_配比检测 SET 强度 = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(强度,CHAR(50),''),CHAR(13),''),'	','')

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比检测]'))

GO
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

    CREATE VIEW [dbo].[cv_搅拌站_配比检测]
    AS
    SELECT 
c50f0 AS [强度],c50f1 AS [类别],nf0 AS [水泥下限],nf1 AS [水泥上限],nf2 AS [325下限],nf3 AS [325上限],nf4 AS [425下限],nf5 AS [425上限],nf6 AS [砂子下限],nf7 AS [砂子上限],nf8 AS [石子下限],nf9 AS [石子上限],nf10 AS [外加剂下限],nf11 AS [外加剂上限],nf12 AS [粉煤灰下限],nf13 AS [粉煤灰上限],nf14 AS [矿粉下限],nf15 AS [矿粉上限],nf16 AS [水下限],nf17 AS [水上限],nf18 AS [硅灰下限],nf19 AS [硅灰上限],nf20 AS [超细砂下限],nf21 AS [超细砂上限]
    FROM dbo.jbz_pei_bi_jian_ce

GO

	SELECT [强度],
		[类别],
		[水泥下限],
		[水泥上限],
		[325下限],
		[325上限],
		[425下限],
		[425上限],
		[砂子下限],
		[砂子上限],
		[石子下限],
		[石子上限],
		[外加剂下限],
		[外加剂上限],
		[粉煤灰下限],
		[粉煤灰上限],
		[矿粉下限],
		[矿粉上限],
		[水下限],
		[水上限],
		NULL [硅灰下限],
		NULL [硅灰上限],
		NULL [超细砂下限],
		NULL [超细砂上限]
	FROM a_搅拌站_配比检测
	WHERE 强度 is not null

	@料舱13仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@创建时间 Datetime =null,
	@创建人 varchar (50) =null,
	@创建端 varchar (50) =null,
	@修改时间 Datetime =null,
	@修改人 varchar (50) =null,
	@修改端 varchar (50) =null,
	@old标题名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@new标题名称 varchar (50) =null

 AS
	DECLARE @msg VARCHAR(200)
	 ----------------判断时间戳是否已经使用过了-------------------------
	IF exists(SELECT 1 FROM 系统_时间戳 WHERE sn=@sn)
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='此时间戳已经使用，请重新保存！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	--------------------------------记录时间戳-------------------------------
	INSERT INTO 系统_时间戳 (sn,dt,msg,code) VALUES (@sn, getdate(), '开始保存配比', 1)

	IF @混泥土级别 IS NULL OR @混泥土级别 = ''
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='强度等级输入错误！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	IF @new标题名称 IS NULL OR @new标题名称 = ''
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='编号输入错误！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END

	---------------------------------判断材料与用量输入是否正确--------------
	IF ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱1干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱1干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱2干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱2干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱3干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱3干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱4干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱4干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱5干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱5干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱6干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱6干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱7干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱7干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱8干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱8干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱9干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱9干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱10名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱10规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱10名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱10规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱10名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱10规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱10干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱10含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱10量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱10含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱10名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱10规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱10干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱10量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱11干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱11干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱12干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱12干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱13干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱13干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱14干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱14干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14量, 0) = 0 )
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='材料及使用量输入错误'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	------------------------------------判断材料是否重复---------------------------
	DECLARE @材料重复 VARCHAR(100)
	SELECT TOP 1 @材料重复 = 名称 + '  ' + 规格 + '  重复了，输入错误' 
	FROM (
		SELECT 名称,规格,COUNT(*) 记录数
		FROM (SELECT @料舱1名称 名称, @料舱1规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱2名称 名称, @料舱2规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱3名称 名称, @料舱3规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱4名称 名称, @料舱4规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱5名称 名称, @料舱5规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱6名称 名称, @料舱6规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱7名称 名称, @料舱7规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱8名称 名称, @料舱8规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱9名称 名称, @料舱9规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱10名称 名称, @料舱10规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱11名称 名称, @料舱11规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱12名称 名称, @料舱12规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱13名称 名称, @料舱13规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱14名称 名称, @料舱14规格 规格) A 
		WHERE 名称 IS NOT NULL AND 名称 != ''
		GROUP BY 名称,规格) a
	WHERE 记录数 >= 2
	IF @材料重复 IS NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg=@材料重复
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	SET @创建时间 = GETDATE()
	SET @料舱1设计值 = @料舱1量
	SET @料舱2设计值 = @料舱2量
	SET @料舱3设计值 = @料舱3量
	SET @料舱4设计值 = @料舱4量
	SET @料舱5设计值 = @料舱5量
	SET @料舱6设计值 = @料舱6量
	SET @料舱7设计值 = @料舱7量
	SET @料舱8设计值 = @料舱8量
	SET @料舱9设计值 = @料舱9量
	SET @料舱10设计值 = @料舱10量
	SET @料舱11设计值 = @料舱11量
	SET @料舱12设计值 = @料舱12量
	SET @料舱13设计值 = @料舱13量
	SET @料舱14设计值 = @料舱14量
	
	BEGIN TRAN
	
	BEGIN TRY
		INSERT INTO cv_搅拌站_配比选用([任务编号],
			[搅拌站],
			[混泥土级别],
			[水泥分配比],
			[砂分配比],
			[石分配比],
			[外加剂分配比],
			[水分配比],
			[选用配比编号],
			[检查标准],
			[检查结果],
			[审核人],
			[审核端],
			[审核意见],
			[批准人],
			[审批状态],
			[料舱1名称],
			[料舱1规格],
			[料舱1备注],
			[料舱2名称],
			[料舱2规格],
			[料舱2备注],
			[料舱3名称],
			[料舱3规格],
			[料舱3备注],
			[料舱4名称],
			[料舱4规格],
			[料舱4备注],
			[料舱5名称],
			[料舱5规格],
			[料舱5备注],
			[料舱6名称],
			[料舱6规格],
			[料舱6备注],

			[料舱7备注],

			[料舱13名称],
			[料舱13规格],
			[料舱13备注],
			[料舱14名称],
			[料舱14规格],
			[料舱14备注],
			[试验室输配比提示],

			[料舱7仿真量],
			[料舱7设计值],
			[料舱7含石率],
			[料舱8量],
			[料舱8干料],
			[料舱8含水率],
			[料舱8仿真量],
			[料舱8设计值],
			[料舱8含石率],
			[料舱9量],
			[料舱9干料],

			[料舱10含石率],
			[料舱11量],
			[料舱11干料],
			[料舱11含水率],

			[料舱11含石率],

			[料舱12设计值],
			[料舱12含石率],
			[料舱13量],
			[料舱13干料],
			[料舱13含水率],
			[料舱13仿真量],
			[料舱13设计值],
			[料舱13含石率],
			[料舱14量],
			[料舱14干料],
			[料舱14含水率],
			[料舱14仿真量],
			[料舱14设计值],
			[料舱14含石率],
			[创建时间],
			[创建人],
			[创建端],

			[标题名称])
		Values(@任务编号,
			@搅拌站,
			@混泥土级别,
			@水泥分配比,
			@砂分配比,
			@石分配比,
			@外加剂分配比,
			@水分配比,
			@选用配比编号,
			@检查标准,
			@检查结果,
			@审核人,
			@审核端,
			@审核意见,
			@批准人,
			@审批状态,
			@料舱1名称,
			@料舱1规格,
			@料舱1备注,
			@料舱2名称,
			@料舱2规格,
			@料舱2备注,
			@料舱3名称,
			@料舱3规格,
			@料舱3备注,
			@料舱4名称,
			@料舱4规格,
			@料舱4备注,
			@料舱5名称,
			@料舱5规格,
			@料舱5备注,
			@料舱6名称,
			@料舱6规格,
			@料舱6备注,
			@料舱7名称,
			@料舱7规格,
			@料舱7备注,
			@料舱8名称,
			@料舱8规格,
			@料舱8备注,
			@料舱9名称,
			@料舱9规格,
			@料舱9备注,
			@料舱10名称,
			@料舱10规格,
			@料舱10备注,
			@料舱11名称,
			@料舱11规格,
			@料舱11备注,
			@料舱12名称,
			@料舱12规格,
			@料舱12备注,
			@料舱13名称,
			@料舱13规格,
			@料舱13备注,
			@料舱14名称,
			@料舱14规格,
			@料舱14备注,
			@试验室输配比提示,
			@审核时间,
			@审核标志,
			@搅拌时间,
			@水灰比,
			@用水量,
			@容重,
			@砂率,
			@外加剂掺量,
			@防冻剂掺量,
			@粉煤灰掺量,
			@矿粉掺量,
			@膨胀剂掺量,
			@早强剂掺量,
			@硅灰掺量,
			@超细砂掺量,
			@附加掺量1,
			@附加掺量2,
			@水泥取代率,
			@粉煤灰超量取代系数,
			@胶料量,
			@骨料量,
			@水泥量,
			@粉煤灰量,
			@矿粉量,
			@膨胀剂量,
			@早强剂量,
			@外加剂量,
			@防冻剂量,
			@砂子量,
			@石子量,
			@硅灰量,
			@超细砂量,
			@附加量1,
			@附加量2,
			@总重量,
			@料舱1量,
			@料舱1干料,
			@料舱1含水率,
			@料舱1仿真量,
			@料舱1设计值,
			@料舱1含石率,
			@料舱2量,
			@料舱2干料,
			@料舱2含水率,
			@料舱2仿真量,
			@料舱2设计值,
			@料舱2含石率,
			@料舱3量,
			@料舱3干料,
			@料舱3含水率,
			@料舱3仿真量,
			@料舱3设计值,
			@料舱3含石率,
			@料舱4量,
			@料舱4干料,
			@料舱4含水率,
			@料舱4仿真量,
			@料舱4设计值,
			@料舱4含石率,
			@料舱5量,
			@料舱5干料,
			@料舱5含水率,
			@料舱5仿真量,
			@料舱5设计值,
			@料舱5含石率,
			@料舱6量,
			@料舱6干料,
			@料舱6含水率,
			@料舱6仿真量,
			@料舱6设计值,
			@料舱6含石率,
			@料舱7量,
			@料舱7干料,
			@料舱7含水率,
			@料舱7仿真量,
			@料舱7设计值,
			@料舱7含石率,
			@料舱8量,
			@料舱8干料,
			@料舱8含水率,
			@料舱8仿真量,
			@料舱8设计值,
			@料舱8含石率,
			@料舱9量,
			@料舱9干料,
			@料舱9含水率,
			@料舱9仿真量,
			@料舱9设计值,
			@料舱9含石率,
			@料舱10量,
			@料舱10干料,
			@料舱10含水率,
			@料舱10仿真量,
			@料舱10设计值,
			@料舱10含石率,
			@料舱11量,
			@料舱11干料,
			@料舱11含水率,
			@料舱11仿真量,
			@料舱11设计值,
			@料舱11含石率,
			@料舱12量,
			@料舱12干料,
			@料舱12含水率,
			@料舱12仿真量,
			@料舱12设计值,
			@料舱12含石率,
			@料舱13量,
			@料舱13干料,
			@料舱13含水率,
			@料舱13仿真量,
			@料舱13设计值,
			@料舱13含石率,
			@料舱14量,
			@料舱14干料,
			@料舱14含水率,
			@料舱14仿真量,
			@料舱14设计值,
			@料舱14含石率,
			@创建时间,
			@创建人,
			@创建端,
			@修改时间,
			@修改人,
			@修改端,
			@new标题名称)
			
		IF @sql IS NOT NULL and @sql != ''
		BEGIN
			SET @sql = REPLACE(@sql, @replaceName, '')
			EXEC (@sql)
		END
	END TRY

	BEGIN CATCH
		SET @msg = 'error:' + Error_message()
	END CATCH
	
	IF CHARINDEX('error:',@msg) = 1
		BEGIN
		ROLLBACK TRAN
		UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		END
	ELSE
		BEGIN
		COMMIT TRAN
		UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 0 WHERE sn=@sn
		END

GO


if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[Update搅拌站_配比选用]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1)
drop procedure [dbo].[Update搅拌站_配比选用]
GO

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[Update_cv_搅拌站_配比选用]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1)
drop procedure [dbo].[Update_cv_搅拌站_配比选用]
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Update_cv_搅拌站_配比选用]
	@sn VARCHAR(50)=null,
	@sql VARCHAR(8000)=null,
	@replaceName VARCHAR(50)=null,
	@任务编号 varchar (50) =null,
	@搅拌站 varchar (50) =null,
	@混泥土级别 varchar (50) =null,
	@水泥分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@砂分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@石分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@外加剂分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@水分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@选用配比编号 varchar (50) =null,
	@检查标准 varchar (50) =null,
	@检查结果 varchar (50) =null,
	@审核人 varchar (50) =null,

	@料舱7备注 varchar (50) =null,

	@料舱9备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱10名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱10规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱10备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱11名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱11规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱11备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱12名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱12规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱12备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱13名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱13规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱13备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱14名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱14规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱14备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@试验室输配比提示 varchar (200) =null,
	@审核时间 Datetime =null,
	@审核标志 bigint =null,
	@搅拌时间 bigint =null,
	@水灰比 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@用水量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@容重 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@砂率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@外加剂掺量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@防冻剂掺量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@粉煤灰掺量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@矿粉掺量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@膨胀剂掺量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@早强剂掺量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,

	@超细砂掺量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@附加掺量1 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@附加掺量2 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@水泥取代率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@粉煤灰超量取代系数 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@胶料量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@骨料量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@水泥量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@粉煤灰量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@矿粉量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@膨胀剂量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@早强剂量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@外加剂量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@防冻剂量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@砂子量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@石子量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@硅灰量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,

	@附加量2 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@总重量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱1量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱1干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,

	@料舱3量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,

	@料舱9干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱9含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱9仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱9设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱9含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱10量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱10干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱10含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱10仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱10设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱10含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱11量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱11干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱11含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱11仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱11设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱11含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱12量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱12干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱12含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱12仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱12设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱12含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@创建时间 Datetime =null,
	@创建人 varchar (50) =null,
	@创建端 varchar (50) =null,
	@修改时间 Datetime =null,
	@修改人 varchar (50) =null,
	@修改端 varchar (50) =null,
	@old标题名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@new标题名称 varchar (50) =null
 AS
	DECLARE @msg VARCHAR(200)
	 ----------------判断时间戳是否已经使用过了-------------------------
	IF exists(SELECT 1 FROM 系统_时间戳 WHERE sn=@sn)
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='此时间戳已经使用，请重新保存！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	--------------------------------记录时间戳-------------------------------
	INSERT INTO 系统_时间戳 (sn,dt,msg,code) VALUES (@sn, getdate(), '开始保存配比', 1)
	
	IF @混泥土级别 IS NULL OR @混泥土级别 = ''
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='强度等级输入错误！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	IF @new标题名称 IS NULL OR @new标题名称 = ''
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='编号输入错误！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	

	---------------------------------判断材料与用量输入是否正确--------------
	IF ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱1干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱1干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱2干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱2干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱3干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱3干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱4干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱4干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱5干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱5干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱6干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱6干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱7干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱7干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱8干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱8干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱9干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱9干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱10名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱10规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱10名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱10规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱10名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱10规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱10干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱10含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱10量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱10含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱10名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱10规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱10干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱10量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱11干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱11干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱12干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱12干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱13干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱13干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱14干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱14干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14量, 0) = 0 )
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='材料及使用量输入错误'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	------------------------------------判断材料是否重复---------------------------
	DECLARE @材料重复 VARCHAR(100)
	SELECT TOP 1 @材料重复 = 名称 + '  ' + 规格 + '  重复了，输入错误' 
	FROM (
		SELECT 名称,规格,COUNT(*) 记录数
		FROM (SELECT @料舱1名称 名称, @料舱1规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱2名称 名称, @料舱2规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱3名称 名称, @料舱3规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱4名称 名称, @料舱4规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱5名称 名称, @料舱5规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱6名称 名称, @料舱6规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱7名称 名称, @料舱7规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱8名称 名称, @料舱8规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱9名称 名称, @料舱9规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱10名称 名称, @料舱10规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱11名称 名称, @料舱11规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱12名称 名称, @料舱12规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱13名称 名称, @料舱13规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱14名称 名称, @料舱14规格 规格) A 
		WHERE 名称 IS NOT NULL AND 名称 != ''
		GROUP BY 名称,规格) a
	WHERE 记录数 >= 2
	IF @材料重复 IS NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg=@材料重复
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	SET @修改时间 = GETDATE()
	SET @料舱1设计值 = @料舱1量
	SET @料舱2设计值 = @料舱2量
	SET @料舱3设计值 = @料舱3量
	SET @料舱4设计值 = @料舱4量
	SET @料舱5设计值 = @料舱5量
	SET @料舱6设计值 = @料舱6量
	SET @料舱7设计值 = @料舱7量
	SET @料舱8设计值 = @料舱8量
	SET @料舱9设计值 = @料舱9量
	SET @料舱10设计值 = @料舱10量
	SET @料舱11设计值 = @料舱11量
	SET @料舱12设计值 = @料舱12量
	SET @料舱13设计值 = @料舱13量
	SET @料舱14设计值 = @料舱14量
	BEGIN TRAN

		UPDATE cv_搅拌站_配比选用 SET
			[任务编号]=@任务编号,

			[料舱13设计值]=@料舱13设计值,
			[料舱13含石率]=@料舱13含石率,
			[料舱14量]=@料舱14量,
			[料舱14干料]=@料舱14干料,
			[料舱14含水率]=@料舱14含水率,
			[料舱14仿真量]=@料舱14仿真量,
			[料舱14设计值]=@料舱14设计值,
			[料舱14含石率]=@料舱14含石率,
			[修改时间]=@修改时间,
			[修改人]=@修改人,
			[修改端]=@修改端,
			[标题名称]=@new标题名称
		WHERE [标题名称]=@old标题名称
			
		IF @sql IS NOT NULL and @sql != ''
		BEGIN
			SET @sql = REPLACE(@sql, @replaceName, '')
			EXEC (@sql)
		END
	END TRY

	BEGIN CATCH
		SET @msg = 'error:' + Error_message()
	END CATCH
	
	IF CHARINDEX('error:',@msg) = 1
		BEGIN
		ROLLBACK TRAN
		UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		END
	ELSE
		BEGIN
		COMMIT TRAN
		UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 0 WHERE sn=@sn
		END

GO


if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[Insert_cv_搅拌站_配比标准]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1)
drop procedure [dbo].[Insert_cv_搅拌站_配比标准]
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Insert_cv_搅拌站_配比标准]
	@sn VARCHAR(50)=null,
	@sql VARCHAR(8000)=null,

	@料舱13含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱13含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14设计值 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱14含石率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@创建时间 Datetime =null,
	@创建人 varchar (50) =null,
	@创建端 varchar (50) =null,
	@修改时间 Datetime =null,
	@修改人 varchar (50) =null,
	@修改端 varchar (50) =null,
	@old标题名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@new标题名称 varchar (50) =null

	
 AS
	DECLARE @msg VARCHAR(200)
	 ----------------判断时间戳是否已经使用过了-------------------------
	IF exists(SELECT 1 FROM 系统_时间戳 WHERE sn=@sn)
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='此时间戳已经使用，请重新保存！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	--------------------------------记录时间戳-------------------------------
	INSERT INTO 系统_时间戳 (sn,dt,msg,code) VALUES (@sn, getdate(), '开始保存配比', 1)

	IF @混泥土级别 IS NULL OR @混泥土级别 = ''
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='强度等级输入错误！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	IF @new标题名称 IS NULL OR @new标题名称 = ''
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='编号输入错误！'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END


	---------------------------------判断材料与用量输入是否正确--------------
	IF ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱1干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱1名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱1规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱1干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱1量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱2干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱2名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱2规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱2干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱2量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱3干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱3名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱3规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱3干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱3量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱4干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱4名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱4规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱4干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱4量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱5干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱5名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱5规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱5干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱5量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱6干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱6名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱6规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱6干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱6量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱7干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱7名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱7规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱7干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱7量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱8干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱8名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱8规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱8干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱8量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱9干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱9名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱9规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱9干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱9量, 0) = 0 ) OR

			ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱11干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱11名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱11规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱11干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱11量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱12干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱12名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱12规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱12干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱12量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱13干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱13名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱13规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱13干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱13量, 0) = 0 ) OR
			ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') != '' OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') = '' OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') = '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') = '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱14干料, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14含水率, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14量, 0) != 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14含石率, 0) != 0  ) OR ISNULL(@料舱14名称, '') != '' AND ISNULL(@料舱14规格, '') != '' AND (ISNULL(@料舱14干料, 0) = 0 OR ISNULL(@料舱14量, 0) = 0 )
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg='材料及使用量输入错误'
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	------------------------------------判断材料是否重复---------------------------
	DECLARE @材料重复 VARCHAR(100)
	SELECT TOP 1 @材料重复 = 名称 + '  ' + 规格 + '  重复了，输入错误' 
	FROM (
		SELECT 名称,规格,COUNT(*) 记录数
		FROM (SELECT @料舱1名称 名称, @料舱1规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱2名称 名称, @料舱2规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱3名称 名称, @料舱3规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱4名称 名称, @料舱4规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱5名称 名称, @料舱5规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱6名称 名称, @料舱6规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱7名称 名称, @料舱7规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱8名称 名称, @料舱8规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱9名称 名称, @料舱9规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱10名称 名称, @料舱10规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱11名称 名称, @料舱11规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱12名称 名称, @料舱12规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱13名称 名称, @料舱13规格 规格 UNION ALL
			SELECT @料舱14名称 名称, @料舱14规格 规格) A 
		WHERE 名称 IS NOT NULL AND 名称 != ''
		GROUP BY 名称,规格) a
	WHERE 记录数 >= 2
	IF @材料重复 IS NOT NULL
	BEGIN
		 SET @msg=@材料重复
		 UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		 RAISERROR (@msg,16,1)
		 RETURN
	END
	
	SET @创建时间 = GETDATE()
	SET @料舱1设计值 = @料舱1量
	SET @料舱2设计值 = @料舱2量
	SET @料舱3设计值 = @料舱3量
	SET @料舱4设计值 = @料舱4量
	SET @料舱5设计值 = @料舱5量
	SET @料舱6设计值 = @料舱6量
	SET @料舱7设计值 = @料舱7量
	SET @料舱8设计值 = @料舱8量
	SET @料舱9设计值 = @料舱9量
	SET @料舱10设计值 = @料舱10量
	SET @料舱11设计值 = @料舱11量
	SET @料舱12设计值 = @料舱12量
	SET @料舱13设计值 = @料舱13量
	SET @料舱14设计值 = @料舱14量
	
	BEGIN TRAN
	
	BEGIN TRY	
		INSERT INTO cv_搅拌站_配比标准([任务编号],
			[搅拌站],
			[混泥土级别],

			[审核人],

			[批准人],
			[审批状态],
			[料舱1名称],
			[料舱1规格],
			[料舱1备注],

			[料舱11设计值],
			[料舱11含石率],
			[料舱12量],
			[料舱12干料],
			[料舱12含水率],
			[料舱12仿真量],
			[料舱12设计值],
			[料舱12含石率],
			[料舱13量],
			[料舱13干料],
			[料舱13含水率],
			[料舱13仿真量],
			[料舱13设计值],
			[料舱13含石率],
			[料舱14量],
			[料舱14干料],
			[料舱14含水率],
			[料舱14仿真量],
			[料舱14设计值],
			[料舱14含石率],
			[创建时间],
			[创建人],
			[创建端],
			[修改时间],
			[修改人],
			[修改端],
			[标题名称])
		Values(@任务编号,
			@搅拌站,
			@混泥土级别,
			@水泥分配比,
			@砂分配比,
			@石分配比,
			@外加剂分配比,
			@水分配比,
			@选用配比编号,
			@检查标准,
			@检查结果,
			@审核人,
			@审核端,
			@审核意见,
			@批准人,
			@审批状态,
			@料舱1名称,
			@料舱1规格,
			@料舱1备注,
			@料舱2名称,
			@料舱2规格,
			@料舱2备注,
			@料舱3名称,

			@用水量,
			@容重,
			@砂率,
			@外加剂掺量,
			@防冻剂掺量,
			@粉煤灰掺量,
			@矿粉掺量,

			@早强剂掺量,
			@硅灰掺量,

			@附加掺量1,
			@附加掺量2,
			@水泥取代率,
			@粉煤灰超量取代系数,

			@骨料量,
			@水泥量,
			@粉煤灰量,

			@砂子量,
			@石子量,
			@硅灰量,
			@超细砂量,
			@附加量1,
			@附加量2,
			@总重量,
			@料舱1量,
			@料舱1干料,
			@料舱1含水率,
			@料舱1仿真量,
			@料舱1设计值,
			@料舱1含石率,
			@料舱2量,
			@料舱2干料,
			@料舱2含水率,
			@料舱2仿真量,
			@料舱2设计值,
			@料舱2含石率,
			@料舱3量,
			@料舱3干料,
			@料舱3含水率,
			@料舱3仿真量,
			@料舱3设计值,
			@料舱3含石率,
			@料舱4量,
			@料舱4干料,
			@料舱4含水率,
			@料舱4仿真量,
			@料舱4设计值,
			@料舱4含石率,
			@料舱5量,
			@料舱5干料,
			@料舱5含水率,
			@料舱5仿真量,
			@料舱5设计值,
			@料舱5含石率,
			@料舱6量,
			@料舱6干料,
			@料舱6含水率,
			@料舱6仿真量,
			@料舱6设计值,
			@料舱6含石率,
			@料舱7量,
			@料舱7干料,
			@料舱7含水率,
			@料舱7仿真量,
			@料舱7设计值,
			@料舱7含石率,
			@料舱8量,
			@料舱8干料,
			@料舱8含水率,
			@料舱8仿真量,
			@料舱8设计值,
			@料舱8含石率,
			@料舱9量,
			@料舱9干料,
			@料舱9含水率,
			@料舱9仿真量,
			@料舱9设计值,
			@料舱9含石率,
			@料舱10量,
			@料舱10干料,
			@料舱10含水率,
			@料舱10仿真量,
			@料舱10设计值,
			@料舱10含石率,
			@料舱11量,
			@料舱11干料,
			@料舱11含水率,
			@料舱11仿真量,
			@料舱11设计值,
			@料舱11含石率,
			@料舱12量,
			@料舱12干料,
			@料舱12含水率,
			@料舱12仿真量,
			@料舱12设计值,
			@料舱12含石率,
			@料舱13量,
			@料舱13干料,
			@料舱13含水率,
			@料舱13仿真量,
			@料舱13设计值,
			@料舱13含石率,
			@料舱14量,
			@料舱14干料,
			@料舱14含水率,
			@料舱14仿真量,
			@料舱14设计值,
			@料舱14含石率,
			@创建时间,
			@创建人,
			@创建端,
			@修改时间,
			@修改人,
			@修改端,
			@new标题名称)
			
		IF @sql IS NOT NULL and @sql != ''
		BEGIN
			SET @sql = REPLACE(@sql, @replaceName, '')
			EXEC (@sql)
		END
	END TRY

	BEGIN CATCH
		SET @msg = 'error:' + Error_message()
	END CATCH
	
	IF CHARINDEX('error:',@msg) = 1
		BEGIN
		ROLLBACK TRAN
		UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 1 WHERE sn=@sn
		END
	ELSE
		BEGIN
		COMMIT TRAN
		UPDATE  系统_时间戳 SET msg = @msg, code = 0 WHERE sn=@sn
		END

GO


if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[Update_cv_搅拌站_配比标准]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1)
drop procedure [dbo].[Update_cv_搅拌站_配比标准]
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Update_cv_搅拌站_配比标准]
	@sn VARCHAR(50)=null,
	@sql VARCHAR(8000)=null,
	@replaceName VARCHAR(50)=null,
	@任务编号 varchar (50) =null,
	@搅拌站 varchar (50) =null,
	@混泥土级别 varchar (50) =null,
	@水泥分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@砂分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@石分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@外加剂分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@水分配比 varchar (50) =null,
	@选用配比编号 varchar (50) =null,
	@检查标准 varchar (50) =null,
	@检查结果 varchar (50) =null,
	@审核人 varchar (50) =null,
	@审核端 varchar (50) =null,
	@审核意见 varchar (50) =null,
	@批准人 varchar (50) =null,
	@审批状态 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱1名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱1规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱1备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱2名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱2规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱2备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱3名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱3规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱3备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱4名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱4规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱4备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱5名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱5规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱5备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱6名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱6规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱6备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱7名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱7规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱7备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱8名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱8规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱8备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱9名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱9规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱9备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱10名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱10规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱10备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱11名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱11规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱11备注 varchar (50) =null,

	@料舱12规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱12备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱13名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱13规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱13备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱14名称 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱14规格 varchar (50) =null,
	@料舱14备注 varchar (50) =null,
	@试验室输配比提示 varchar (200) =null,
	@审核时间 Datetime =null,
	@审核标志 bigint =null,
	@搅拌时间 bigint =null,
	@水灰比 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@用水量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,

	@砂率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,

	@料舱11干料 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱11含水率 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
	@料舱11仿真量 DECIMAL(18, 4) =null,
